tool_description: A set of API endpoints that provide Hong Kong financial market data
name: Hong Kong Finance
title: Hong Kong Finance

api_list.name: Stock Option Open Interest
api_list.description: Returns stock option open interest data across all strikes for given market date, underlying, expiry date combination.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hong-kong-finance.p.rapidapi.com/stock-option-open-interest/2024-02-15/00001/2024-02-28"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hong-kong-finance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hong-kong-finance.p.rapidapi.com/stock-option-open-interest/{date}/{underlying}/{expiry}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hong-kong-finance.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
